author: jvanzyl
msg: o Correcting the project verification. I put it all in the attainGoals method
for now so that every project will be verified. We can add some options
to make this configurable. Thanks to Dion for pointing this one out.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Adding todo item regarding local setting verification.

author: kaz
msg: Modified the VelocityTagLib such that a 'basedir' attribute is required.
When I first wrote the tag lib the file resource loader was hardcoded to
"/" which just wasn't a great thing to do.  Each invocation of the
velocity:merge tag will reuse the same VelocityEngine as long as the
basedir attributes are the same.  If they differ, a new VelocityEngine
is created that is initialized to use the new basedir.
